for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = list(input())
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    front = '0'
    rear = 'Z'
    found = False
    while i <= j:
        if s[i] > s[j]:
            temp = s[i]
            s[i] = s[j]
            s[j] = temp
        if i == 0:
            front = s[i]
            rear = s[j]
        elif s[i] >= front and s[j] <= rear:
            front = s[i]
            rear = s[j]
        else:
            found = True
            break
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if not found:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    s = input()
    (l, k) = ([], [])
    l.extend(s)
    k.extend(s)
    k.sort()
    for i in range(len(s) // 2):
        if l[i] >= l[-(i + 1)]:
            te = l[-(i + 1)]
            l[-(i + 1)] = l[i]
            l[i] = te
    if k == l:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    l = list(map(str, s))
    l1 = l.copy()
    l.sort()
    x = ''.join(l)
    count = 0
    for i in range(len(s) // 2):
        if l1[i] > l1[len(s) - 1 - i]:
            (l1[i], l1[len(s) - 1 - i]) = (l1[len(s) - 1 - i], l1[i])
            count += 1
    y = ''.join(l1)
    if x == y and count <= n:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

def solve():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    p = list(s)
    i = 0
    j = len(s) - 1
    while i < j:
        if p[i] > p[j]:
            (p[i], p[j]) = (p[j], p[i])
        j += -1
        i += 1
    s = ''.join(p)
    print('YES' if s == ''.join(sorted(s)) else 'NO')
for _ in range(int(input())):
    solve()

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    s1 = s
    s1 = ''.join(sorted(s1))
    start = 0
    end = len(s) - 1
    l = [*s]
    while start < end:
        if l[start] > l[end]:
            (l[start], l[end]) = (l[end], l[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    newstr = ''.join(l)
    if newstr == s1:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
